backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented romantic UI enhancements including kiss marks, background music, color scheme redesign, firecracker animations, bouquet sequence, and butterfly animations, all tracked to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary describing frontend/index.html as a complete standalone romantic birthday microsite and frontend/src/App.tsx as a minimal placeholder directing users to the HTML file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space for backgrounds, borders, and UI components.
frontend/index.html: Self-contained romantic birthday microsite with mature dark aesthetic featuring firecracker animations, flying butterflies, bouquet presentation, kiss marks, background music, and sophisticated color palette (truncated content).
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple React component displaying a message instructing users to open the standalone index.html file to view the birthday microsite experience.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated actors, and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation validation (truncated content).
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state tracking a romantic birthday microsite with intro animation, question flow, envelope reveal, and letter display. Known issues include missing kiss marks, background music problems, overly childish design, and missing firecracker/bouquet/butterfly animations.
